casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sidney J. PATTON. No. 347P98-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of July 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review and Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
